meanings.definition: Free from living organisms or other contaminants.
meanings.sent1: The laboratory required a bioclean environment for the experiment.
meanings.sent2: The hospital room was bioclean to prevent infections.
meanings.sent3: The bioclean kitchen was so spotless that even the ants stayed away.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like a bioclean slate, free from any distracting thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The bioclean water sparkled in the sunlight, showing its purity.

meanings.definition: To clean using biological agents or processes.
meanings.sent1: The company decided to bioclean the oil spill using natural bacteria.
meanings.sent2: She chose to bioclean her house with eco-friendly products.
meanings.sent3: The gardeners biocleaned the soil, making sure to use only organic fertilizers.
meanings.sent4: He biocleaned his computer from viruses, using specialized software.
meanings.sent5: The city decided to bioclean the river by introducing fish that eat algae.
